content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: book
inventory=[{"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 64, "index": 22}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 48, "index": 33}, {"type": "leather", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 52, "index": 35}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 37, "index": 37}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 43, "index": 41}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 64, "index": 43}, {"type": "podzol", "quantity": 15, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a book, I need to craft paper. Paper requires 3 sugar canes in a row in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move 1 sugar cane from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: book
inventory=[{"type": "sugar", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 64, "index": 22}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 48, "index": 33}, {"type": "leather", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 52, "index": 35}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 37, "index": 37}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 43, "index": 41}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 64, "index": 43}, {"type": "podzol", "quantity": 15, "index": 45}]
thought: I have moved 1 sugar cane to slot 1, so now I need to move another sugar cane to the right of it (slot 2).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: book
inventory=[{"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 64, "index": 22}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 48, "index": 33}, {"type": "leather", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 52, "index": 35}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 37, "index": 37}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 43, "index": 41}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 64, "index": 43}, {"type": "podzol", "quantity": 15, "index": 45}]
thought: I have moved 2 sugar canes into the crafting grid, so now I need to move the final sugar cane to the right of the other 2 (slot 3).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: book
inventory=[{"type": "paper", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 64, "index": 22}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 48, "index": 33}, {"type": "leather", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 52, "index": 35}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 37, "index": 37}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 43, "index": 41}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 64, "index": 43}, {"type": "podzol", "quantity": 15, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have the sugar canes in the crafting grid, I can craft the paper and move it to the inventory.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3

TASK: Craft an item of type: book
inventory=[{"type": "paper", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 64, "index": 22}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 48, "index": 33}, {"type": "leather", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 52, "index": 35}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 37, "index": 37}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 43, "index": 41}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 64, "index": 43}, {"type": "podzol", "quantity": 15, "index": 45}]

thought: Now that I have the paper, I can craft the book. To craft a book, I need to place 1 paper in the top left corner of the crafting grid, 1 paper in the middle, and 1 paper in the bottom left corner. Therefore I will move 1 paper from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "paper", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 64, "index": 22}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 48, "index": 33}, {"type": "leather", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 52, "index": 35}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 37, "index": 37}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 43, "index": 41}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 64, "index": 43}, {"type": "podzol", "quantity": 15, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I have moved 1 paper to the top left corner of the crafting grid, so I need to move another paper to the middle of the grid (slot 2).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "paper", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 64, "index": 22}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 48, "index": 33}, {"type": "leather", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 52, "index": 35}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 37, "index": 37}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 43, "index": 41}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 64, "index": 43}, {"type": "podzol", "quantity": 15, "index": 45}]

thought: Now that I have the papers in the crafting grid, I need to place the leather in the crafting grid to craft the book. To craft a book, I need to place 1 leather in the top right corner of the crafting grid. Therefore I will move 1 leather from slot 34 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: book
inventory=[{"type": "book", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "leather", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 64, "index": 22}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 48, "index": 33}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 52, "index": 35}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 37, "index": 37}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 43, "index": 41}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 64, "index": 43}, {"type": "podzol", "quantity": 15, "index": 45}]

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
